questions.question: Wages from employment are included in income.
Interest on investments is included in income
Money you inherit is included in income.
Money you borrow (i.e. a loan) is included in income.

choices.answer: Bring an extra copy of my resume
Prepare a question to ask the interviewer

questions.question: In a job interview, I should not...

choices.answer: Dress one step above the average worker
Make eye contact with the interviewer
Speak softly and answer questions quickly

questions.question: When thinking about a career, which of the following are important to consider?

choices.answer: Value of the work to society
The number of workers available for competing jobs

questions.question: Which of the following describes entrepreneurship?

choices.answer: The process of starting/operating your own business
A person who has a great idea or invention.
Doing what your boss tells you to do

questions.question: Which of these is a benefit of being an entrpreneur?

choices.answer: May lose money and have to close down
Putting in 45+ hours each week at start up
Not having to pay taxes on business earnings

questions.question: Gross pay is calculated by

choices.answer: Adding deductions to rate of pay
Multiplying the total number of hours works by rate of pay
Dividing the Medicare tax rate by # of hours worked
Subtracting taxes and deductions from net pay

questions.question: Required deductions from your paycheck include

choices.answer: Federal tax, state tax, social security tax, & med insurance
Federal tax, state tax, social security tax, & retirement.
Federal tax, state tax, social security tax, & medicare tax
Federal tax, medicare tax, charity expense, & child care

questions.question: A four year college/university degree is called

choices.answer: Interviewing people who are currently working in that job

questions.question: The form that tells an employer how much to take out of your paycheck
The I-9 is a work form used to

choices.answer: prove your high school and parents authorize you to work
detail your work experience since you turned 16
verify the identity & work authorization of people in the US
determine how many hours you are authorized to work

questions.question: Repayment of government subsidized student loans for an undergraduate typically starts

choices.answer: as soon as you graduate college
when you decide that you can afford to make payments
6 months after you are no longer in school

questions.question: A standard resume should

choices.answer: be more than 1 page, single sided

questions.question: The people you list as a reference on your resume or application should not be

choices.answer: someone who will say good things about you
someone you have asked to be used as a reference

questions.question: Information needed to complete the FAFSA is

choices.answer: last year's tax information for your parents & yourself
an essay about your future career choice

choices.answer: Types of stores in each area
Cost of living in each area
How much it will cost to move

paid to you as a Christmas bonus
earned at work b/f required & elected deductions are removed
earned at work a/f required & elected deductions are removed

choices.answer: All grades earned during high school

choices.answer: the level of prices relating to a range of everyday items
the number of jobs available in the area
the amount of money paid to own a house
